With $4.51 million received, 2024 has broken the previous record for total Giving Day donations to Columbia Athletics

The total value of donations surpassed $4 million for the first time in five years, overtaking 2018’s previous record of $4.13 million.

Total donations

$4,513,871

$4,000,000

$4,125,564

$3,369,022

$3,000,000

$3,180,677

$2,978,730

$2,930,557

$2,000,000

$1,000,000

2018

2019

2020

2021

2022

2024

Note: There is no data for last year because Giving Day was indefinitely postponed in 2023.

Source: Columbia Giving Day

Graphic by Molly Durawa
